name: jahe-react-starter

scripts.build:prod: npm run build:clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build:prod:withstats: npm run build:clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js --profile --json > webpack-stats.json

author: Jannik Hell
//: autoprefixer: used in webpack post-css loader to prefix css verbs with vendor specific css verbs
babel-cli: includes babel-node executable which is used to npm run manage:translations
babel-core: includes the babel compiler which is used to transform es6 to es5 code
babel-jest: will use babel to test es6 code with jest
webpack-validator: validates webpack config within config file with validate(config)
moment: consistent date and time API with types, formatting, modifying
react-intl: provides language specific string, date/time and number formatting
react-redux: provides redux store to react components with connect(component)
redux: flux state management (inspired by Elm architecture)
redux-thunk: redux middleware to use asynchronous actions
